duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage a team responsible for exceptional customer service standards, operational soundness, and revenue generation.
Act as a backup to personal banking team, open new accounts, receive loan requests, and gather credit-related information.
Ensure the branch is operationally sound and client service specialists are trained and competent in explaining all products and services offered.
Monitor sales and service goals, process and oversee technical tasks, and provide guidance and training to branch team.
Resolve conflicts unassisted, actively contribute to employee management and training, and frequently service complex accounts.
Actively coach and mentor team to deepen customer relations, begin to independently engage in business development, and ensure satisfactory audits.
Independently oversee client service specialists and may independently oversee personal bankers or collaborate with branch manager to do so.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree preferred, High school diploma or GED required
